news_header: Hamas is set to release three male hostages as part of a prisoner exchange with Israel during the ceasefire.
news_text: On Saturday, Hamas will release three male civilian hostages, including Ohad Ben Ami and Eli Sharabi, as part of the fifth prisoner exchange during the current ceasefire. The hostages were abducted from Be'er Kibbutz and a music festival. Israel is expected to release 183 Palestinian prisoners in return, including those with life sentences and long prison terms. The hostages will be handed over to the Red Cross in Deir al-Balah.
